protein.general_function: Involved in transmembrane receptor protein tyrosine kinase activity
protein.specific_function: Isoform 2 may act as an antagonist of EGF action

go_class.description: receptor signaling protein tyrosine kinase activity
transmembrane receptor protein tyrosine kinase activity
cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
enzyme linked receptor protein signaling pathway
transmembrane receptor protein tyrosine kinase signaling pathway
